home_main_text: Happy fasting to all Muslim fellow around the world. May this Ramadan bring endlessly moments of joy and we are always in the protection of ALLAH.
aboutUs_text: Here at Ramadan Cards, you can congratulate your family, friends, and everyone you love on the occasion of the arrival of the blessed month of Ramadan by creating a greeting card using our templates with ease.
prices_card_text: The perfect way to get started and get used to our tool.
